executiveSummary: Nick Taranto and Josh Hicks, founders of Plated, pitched their meal-kit delivery company to the Sharks, seeking $500,000 for 4% equity at a $12.5 million valuation. After discussing business metrics, scalability, and customer value, one Shark offered $500,000 at a $9 million valuation (approximately 5.5% equity) with advisory shares, which the founders considered on the spot.
keyDecisions: One Shark offered $500,000 at a $9 million valuation with advisory shares; final deal acceptance not confirmed during the meeting.
